MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan, affecting properties in Fernlea Crescent and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have restored power to a number of properties in the area,  and for properties still without power we now expect your supply to be restored by Midnight. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:22pm on Wednesday, 17 February 2021
